foreignData.name: Flammenkegel
foreignData.text: Bestimme drei Kreaturen und/oder Spieler Deiner Wahl. Der Flammenkegel fügt dem ersten Ziel 1 Schadenspunkt, dem zweiten Ziel 2 Schadenspunkte und dem dritten Ziel 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

name: Cone of Flame
originalText: Choose three target creatures and/or players. Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to the first, 2 damage to the second, and 3 damage to the third.

rulings.text: Each of the three targets must be different. If there aren’t three different legal targets available, you can’t cast the spell.
If one or two of Cone of Flame’s targets are illegal when it resolves, you can’t change how much damage will be dealt to the remaining legal targets.

text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.
